Package com.group26.node.packet.formats

Class LinkStateUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group26.node.packet.formats.LinkStateUpdate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkPacket
    public class LinkStateUpdate
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkPacket
    Packet that is used to update the node's link state and transmit it across the network. Link states are used to determine packet transmitters for multi-hoping.

        public void setSenderId​(byte senderId)

        Parameters:
        senderId - sender node id

      • getTtl

        public byte getTtl()
        Returns:
        the time-to-live of the current packet in the network

      • setTtl

        public void setTtl​(byte ttl)
        Sets the packet's time-to-live (ttl) in the network. When the ttl hits 0, it is not allowed to be transmitted further.
        Parameters:
        ttl - packet time-to-live
